sentence.Network_en: He ran a day and night line, copying by sun - light and by candle - light.
sentence.Network_cn: 他白天靠日光,夜晚藉烛光, 夜以继日地抄写.

sentence.Network_en: Megamalls and fast food restaurants line the highway system.
sentence.Network_cn: 公路系统沿线有大型商场和快餐店。

sentence.Network_en: Their first car rolls off the production line on December 16.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的第一辆车于12月16日下线。

in some cities , people lined up all night outside computer stores for windows 7 , the latest version of microsoft' s operating system , which went on sale to the public on october 22nd .一些城市，人们为了买到微软开始于10月22日公开发售的最新版操作系统windows7，在电脑商店外通宵排队。
